Chicken Caesar Wrap 
Ingredients: Instructions: Quinoa Salad 
Ingredients: 1 cup cooked quinoa 
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 
1/2 cucumber, diced 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped 
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled Instructions: In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. Turkey and Avocado Sandwich 
Ingredients: Instructions: •  Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. 
•  Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. 
•  Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half. •  Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread. 
•  Layer the turkey, avocado, and spinach on top. 
•  Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half. 1 whole wheat tortilla 
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced 
• 
1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped 
• 
•  2 tablespoons Caesar dressing 
•  2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese 
•  Optional: croutons for extra crunch • 
•  Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. 
•  Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine. •  2 slices whole grain bread 
•  4 slices turkey breast 
1/2 avocado, sliced 
• 
1/2 cup spinach leaves 
• 
1 tablespoon mustard or mayo

Ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt 
1/2 cup granola 
1/2 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) 
1 tablespoon honey Instructions: In a bowl or jar, layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries. Hummus and Veggie Pita 
Ingredients: 1 whole wheat pita bread 
1/2 cup hummus 
1/2 cup cucumber, sliced 
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced 
1/4 cup shredded carrots 
1/4 cup baby spinach Instructions: Tuna Salad 
Ingredients: 1 can tuna, drained 
1/4 cup mayonnaise 
1 tablespoon Dijon mustard 
1 celery stalk, diced 
1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped Instructions: In a bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and red onion. •  Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets. 
•  Spread hummus inside each pocket. 
•  Fill with cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach.

• 
•  Drizzle with honey. 
•  Repeat the layers if desired. • 
•  Season with salt and pepper. • 
•

•  Lettuce leaves or whole grain bread for serving •

cheese. •  Lay a slice of turkey flat and spread with hummus.

•  Add bell pepper, broccoli, and snap peas, and stir-fry until tender. 
•  Add the cooked chicken and soy sauce, and stir to combine. 
•  Drizzle with sesame oil and serve over rice. •

•  Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine. •

Ingredients: Instructions: Spinach and Feta Stuﬀed Pita 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a bowl, combine the spinach, feta cheese, and cherry tomatoes. •  Lay a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat. 
•  Spread a thin layer of sushi rice over the nori, leaving a 1-inch border at the top. 
•  Arrange the cucumber, avocado, and carrot in a line along the bottom edge of the rice. 
•  Roll the nori tightly using the bamboo mat. 
•  Slice into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce. •  Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets. 
• 
•  Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. 
•  Stuﬀ the mixture into the pita pockets. • 
•  Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. 
•  Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine. 1 whole wheat pita bread

Ingredients: 1 whole wheat tortilla 
1/2 cup chickpeas, mashed •  Lay the tortilla flat and sprinkle half of the cheese on one side. 
•  Add the bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion. 
•  Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and fold the tortilla in half. 
•  Cook in a skillet over medium heat until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is golden •  Spread hummus on one slice of bread. 
•  Layer the roasted eggplant, spinach, and roasted red peppers on top. 
•  Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half. • 
•  Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice. 
•  Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine. •  Slice into wedges.
